name: ctaBlox
description: ctaBlox is a 3D multiplayer game for Windows that combines humor, memes, and building elements. The game allows players to create their own games or play games created by others and provides server hosting and joining capabilities for multiplayer gaming. In ctaBlox, players can customize the appearance of their avatar, including the color, and create a unique username to be displayed while playing multiplayer games. The username system is experimental and may have bugs or limitations that need to be addressed. ctaBlox offers a unique and entertaining gaming experience for those who enjoy building and playing games with others and have a fondness for humor and memes.
